courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Architecture.
description: Design studio investigations of issues that impact urban habitats, buildings and people. Architecture and urban design, preservation, and adaptation of new and existing buildings, cities, districts, public realms and urban environments. Designing and preserving buildings and communities in a sustainable manner. Field trips may be required. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Architecture.
label: Design:Arch/Urban&Preservation
